pages.text: Farmer's Delight adds a lot of additional food items and also it's own mechanics.$(br2)One of them, is that pigs (and other mobs) have extra drops, when you kill them with knives!$(br2)Knives can also be used on grass, to get straw.
Drops from pigs, when they are killed with knives.
You can also create compost, that turns into rich soil, over time.$(br)Rich soil can be tilled, to form rich farmland, that $(l)cannot be trampled!$()
Rich soil can also be used to grow mushroom colonies.$(br2)These can then be cut with shears, to get them as they are, or harvested for 5 $(item)mushrooms($().
The nether offers its own delighted additions. You can make rich soul soil, to grow fungus colonies.
There are also more dangerous crops though. The $(thing)Propelplant$() explodes on harvest!
